TEXT.French: Double Production Speed of National Wonders
TEXT.Italian: Double Production Speed of National Wonders
TEXT.Spanish: Double Production Speed of National Wonders

TEXT.Spanish: Double Production Speed of State [ICON_RELIGION] Buildings

TEXT.Spanish: Double Movement and +10% Strength in Desert for All Land Units

TEXT.Spanish: Free Shock Promotion for Melee and Cavalry Units

TEXT.Spanish: Double Gold from City Conquest and Pillage

TEXT.Spanish: Reduced [ICON_UNHAPPY] and Instability from Foreign Culture and Religion

TEXT.Spanish: +100% Golden Age Length until the Mongol Invasions Era

TEXT.French: Pas de résistance dans les villes conquises

TEXT.Spanish: All Mounted Units receive +50% Strength vs. Barbarians

TEXT.French: Free Dakhani Units for each razed or massacred city

TEXT.Italian: Free Dakhani Units for each razed or massacred city
TEXT.Spanish: Free Dakhani Units for each razed or massacred city

TEXT.Spanish: Transfers a portion of [ICON_CULTURE] of razed and massacred cities to the capital

TEXT.Spanish: No Anarchy Between Religion and Civic Changes

TEXT.Italian: Double movement through Ocean for all naval units
TEXT.Spanish: Double movement through Ocean for all naval units

TEXT.English: The artisans spared from the destruction of %s1_name have been brought to %s2_name and produced %d3_culture [ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.French: The artisans spared from the destruction of %s1_name have been brought to %s2_name and produced %d3_culture [ICON_CULTURE]

TEXT.Italian: The artisans spared from the destruction of %s1_name have been brought to %s2_name and produced %d3_culture [ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.Spanish: The artisans spared from the destruction of %s1_name have been brought to %s2_name and produced %d3_culture [ICON_CULTURE]

TEXT.English: New Dakhanis of the destroyed %s1_name have joined your army!
TEXT.French: New Dakhanis of the destroyed %s1_name have joined your army!
TEXT.German: Neue Dakhanis aus der zerstörten Stadt %s1_name haben sich Eurer Armee angeschlossen!

TEXT.Spanish: New Dakhanis of the destroyed %s1_name have joined your army!
